name: kener
description: Kener is a simple uptime and endpoint monitoring service. It sends requests to configured URLs, records response status and times, and shows checks in a minimal dashboard suitable for monitoring small fleets of services.
features: Uptime Monitoring: Regular health checks for endpoints with response time tracking. Monitor service availability continuously.
Status Dashboard: Clean, minimal interface showing service status at a glance. Quick overview of infrastructure health.
Incident Tracking: Automatic downtime detection with historical incident logs. Track outage patterns over time.
Response Time Metrics: Monitor and graph response times for performance analysis. Identify slow services quickly.
Multi-Endpoint: Monitor multiple services and URLs from single dashboard. Centralize monitoring efforts.
Alert Notifications: Get notified of downtime via email, webhooks, or integrations. Stay informed about outages.
Public Status Page: Share service status with users through public page. Communicate availability transparently.
Historical Data: View uptime history and incident reports over time. Analyze reliability trends.
Custom Checks: Configure HTTP, TCP, and ping checks with custom parameters. Monitor various service types.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage with fast, efficient monitoring. Run on modest hardware.
Configuration as Code: Define monitors in YAML configuration files. Version control your monitoring setup.
Dark Mode: Eye-friendly dark theme for comfortable viewing. Reduce eye strain during monitoring.
